episodes.title: Majin ga umareta hi
episodes.plot: Lelouch Lamperouge, a Britannian student, accidentally gets involved with a group of terrorists. He meets a mysterious woman who gives him the powers of Geass, the "Power of Kings".

episodes.title: Kakusei no shiroki kishi
episodes.plot: While Lelouch comes to realize his new power, using it and his superior strategic abilities to help the terrorists in their attack. The White Knight arrives, and ruins his plans.

episodes.title: Itsuwari no kurasumeito
episodes.plot: Kallen Stadfeld is a new student at school, but Lelouch knows that she is actually one of the terrorists involved in the rebellion.

episodes.title: Sono na wa zero
episodes.plot: Lelouch takes on a secret identity called Zero, to save his friend Suzaku.

episodes.title: Kôjo to majo
episodes.plot: Lelouch is reunited with C2, the strange girl who granted him the power of Geass. Since Zero confessed to Clovis' murder, Suzaku is acquitted of all charges. He meets Princess Euphemia, who has him guide her around Area 11.

episodes.title: Ubawareta kamen
episodes.plot: Suzaku is enrolled in Ashford Academy, but is shunned because of his association in the murder of the previous Viceroy. Although he and Lelouch are old friends, they decide to keep it a secret for Lelouch's sake.

episodes.title: Kôneria wo ute
episodes.plot: Zero makes his appearance at a vital time, and his objective is to capture the Viceroy Cornelia. However, Cornelia is just as good as Lelouch.

episodes.title: Kuro no kishidan
episodes.plot: The student council of Ashford academy are taken hostage as is the Viceroy's younger sister, Lady Euphemia.

episodes.title: Rifurein
episodes.plot: Refrain, a drug that makes a person remember the past, is being targeted at Elevens. Kallen's motives and beliefs are examined.

episodes.title: Guren mau
episodes.plot: Zero's Black Knights are becoming a rallying point for Japanese, and they receive "gifts" from the main underground Japanese forces. Zero once again inserts his forces into battle, with the intention of capturing Cornelia.

episodes.title: Narita kôbôsen
episodes.plot: Zero manages to destroy most of Cornelia's units and the superior technology of Kallen's Knighmare is enough to take on the White Knight, who saves Cornelia. Lelouch is pursued by the White Knight.

episodes.title: Kyôto kara no shisha
episodes.plot: Shirly plucks up the courage to ask Lelouch out. Lelouch assumes the identity of Zero and goes to meet the main figures in the Japanese rebellion, wanting to gain their support.

episodes.title: Shârî to jûkô
episodes.plot: Lelouch has doubts about his actions, as they caused the death of Shirly's father. Viletta reveals to Shirly that she believes that Lelouch is involved with the Black Knights, those responsible for her father's death.

episodes.title: Giasu tai giasu
episodes.plot: Lelouch is scattered as he can not remember what happened when he was unconscious. Shirly found out that he is Zero. Mao reveals his presence. He also has the power of Geass.

episodes.title: Kassai no mao
episodes.plot: Mao's ability to read people's minds enables him to manipulate people. Lelouch must defeat him or face the destruction of what he fights for.

episodes.title: Toraware no nanari
episodes.plot: Lelouch's sister Nunnally is kidnapped by Mao. Suzaku and Lelouch work together to save her, while Lelouch tries to keep Geass, and Zero, a secret.

episodes.title: Kishi
episodes.plot: An inauguration ceremony is held for Clovis' memorial art museum, with Euphemia judging the art contest. Lelouch helps Kyoshiro Tohdoh's comrades rescue their leader.

episodes.title: Kururugi suzaku ni meijiru
episodes.plot: Lelouch now knows the identity of the White Knight as his friend, Suzaku, who is officially named Princess Euphemia's Knight. Lelouch draws Suzaku into a trap.

episodes.title: Kami no shima
episodes.plot: Lelouch, Euphemia, Suzaku and Kallen find themselves on a mysterious Island. Euphemia knows that Zero's true identity, Lelouch, is her brother. Suzaku finds out that Kallen is the pilot of Guren.

episodes.title: Kyûshû seneki
episodes.plot: Suzaku is sent into a battle after handing in his resignation as Euphemia's Knight. Lelouch, as Zero, comes to assist him in a tight spot.

episodes.title: Gakuensai sengen!
episodes.plot: Euphemia has an idea that may finally bring peace to Japan. She goes undercover to Ashford Academy to talk to her brother.

episodes.title: Chizome no euphie
episodes.plot: Lelouch must decide whether to accept Euphy's terms of peace. His motives for destroying Britannia is to create a peaceful world for his sister Nunnally, but he also recognizes his want for revenge.

episodes.title: Semete kanashi mi totomo ni
episodes.plot: Lelouch's accidental Geass on Euphemia destroys any hope of peace, and Suzaku, enraged at what Zero has done, sets out with revenge in mind. V2 reveals Zero's secret of Geass to Suzaku.

episodes.title: Tsuiraku no sutêji
episodes.plot: The Black Knights fight against Britannia in a battle for the Tokyo Settlement.

episodes.title: Zero
episodes.plot: After using his Geass on Cornelia, Lelouch discovers that she doesn't know who killed his mother. C2 senses that Nunnally has been kidnapped, and Lelouch abandons the Black Knights to rescue her.
